quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Steel Magnolias

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cause a US - Soviet war

options.text: They both turn out to be gays.
One has a wig on and the other is her sisters husband.
One tries to get her drunk and the other likes Gary.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One tries to get her drunk and the other likes Gary.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pool Table
